appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Automatic voting on minecraft ratings for projects or servers
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

disabledNotifWarnTooltip.message: For example, a notification that you have already voted (This is when the extension tried to vote for the project but you yourself have already voted)

enableSyncStorage.message: Save extension settings in the cloud

enableSyncStorageTooltip.message: It is not recommended to enable this setting if you have a lot of projects in the list of added projects. The cloud has limited traffic and storage space. For this function to work, your account must be connected and synchronization enabled, otherwise the settings will still be saved locally Allows you to synchronize extension settings with multiple computers, it is not recommended to keep the extension enabled with this setting enabled on several computers at once

disabledCheckTime.message: Disable time checking at extension start

disableCheckProjects.message: Disable check when adding a project
disableCheckProjects.description: Checkbox. Disable check when adding a project

disableCheckProjectsTooltip.message: It is highly discouraged to disable this check, it can cause errors in the extension and can break the auto-voting mechanism, this setting disables checking when adding a project, this disables checking for MCRate (As you know, you can vote there only for one project per day) It also disables check for VK authorization This parameter is not saved when saving the settings
disableCheckProjectsTooltip.description: Tooltip. Disable check when adding a project

priorityTooltip.message: When this option is enabled and after when adding a project, the project will be in priority, it will always be the very first to vote and without a delay of 10 minutes

enabledSilentVoteTooltip.message: Quiet Mode (Recommended) - Vote for projects entirely in the background without opening any tabs. Emulation mode - emulates a real user, opens a tab and clicks on the voting button, it is best to leave at least one open tab in the browser in this mode, otherwise the browser window will be open on top of other windows and may cause inconvenience.

addedProjects.message: List of projects you have already added

notAdded.message: You haven't added any projects to this top yet!
notAdded.description: Notification. You haven't added any projects

notAvaibledInSilent.message: By default, it is not available in silent voting mode!
notAvaibledInSilent.description: Notification. available in silent voting mode

firstInstall.message: thank You for installing the extension. For further work, you need to configure it

firstSettingsSave.message: Settings were successfully generated by default and saved

settingsUpdateEnd2.message: Settings were successfully updated by default and saved

confirmDisableErrors.message: Do You really want to disable error notifications? If there is any problem when voting, the extension will try to vote again every 5 minutes. If you don't get errors and don't keep track of them, the extension will endlessly try to vote. be careful with this, you may be blocked for trying to vote so often

settingsSyncCopySuccess.message: Settings were successfully copied to the cloud

settingsSyncCopyLocalSuccess.message: Settings were successfully copied to local storage

confirmDisableCheckProjects.message: Do You really want to disable verification when adding a project? If you make an error when adding a project it may lead to errors

confirmPrioriry.message: Do You really want to give priority to adding a project? When you enable priority, you may have problems with voting if you don't have the exact time on your device. Set the exact time (accurate to the second) and follow it for correct voting with priority

alreadyAdded.message: You have already added this project

oneProjectFairTop.message: You can only vote for 1 project on FairTop at a time. to vote for multiple projects, prohibit the site FairTop.in save cookies, if you don't know how to do it - Google it If you do not allow saving cookies, disable verification when adding a project in the advanced settings and try adding this project again. Be careful with the project ID when adding a project with verification disabled, the extension may accept a project with a non-existent ID.

oneProjectMinecraftIpList.message: On MinecraftIpList, you can only vote for 5 projects at a time.

oneProject.message: On $project$, you can only vote for 1 project at a time

checkHasProject.message: Checking whether such a project exists...

notConnectInternet.message: it Seems you don't have an Internet connection, see the details in the console

notFoundProjectCode.message: There is no such project! HTTP status code:

notFoundProjectRedirect.message: There was a redirect, most likely there is no such project! Check the URL:

notConnectInternetVPN.message: Tou don't Seem to have an Internet connection (are You from Ukraine? Enable the VPN and keep it enabled at the time of auto-voting), see the details in the console

authVK.message: To vote on $project$, authorization via VK is required

notConnect.message: Failed to connect to $url$, HTTP status code:

warnSilentVote.message: Please note that $top$ is not available in silent voting mode

cooldownChanged.message: In order for the changes to take effect, the extension must be restarted. when you restart the settings, they will be closed, and you will need to manually reopen them. Restart the extension?

storageError.message: An error occurred while reading the settings, see the details in the console

storageErrorSave.message: An error occurred while saving settings, see the details in the console

disableNotifInfo.message: Notifications about successful voting are disabled

disableNotifStart.message: Notifications about the beginning of voting are disabled

closeTab.message: Do You want to close this tab?

warnMultiVote2.message: If you are asked by a stranger to enter this command-do not be fooled! 11 chances out of 10 that you are the victim of a Scam. If you confirm entering the command, the fraudster may be able to access your VK account!

enableMultiVote.message: Include the possibility of voting with multiple accounts VK

enableSaveVKCookies.message: Enable the binding from the cookie added to the VK project

projectIDTooltip.message: Project ID can be obtained from the address bar while on the project page, for example: on TopCraft for StarWay ID: 10496

inputProjectIDOrList.message: Enter an ID or select from the list

feedback.message: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us at

internetDisconected.message: It's time to vote, but the Internet connection is lost, I'm waiting for the Internet connection to resume...

errorAuthVK.message: VK authorization Error! Vote manually for this project so that next time there is no error with VK authorization

errorRedirected.message: voting Error! Redirection to an unknown site occurred: $url$ Check this URL

errorVoteNoElement.message: Voting error, it seems some necessary element/button is missing

errorVoteUnknown.message: Error when voting! Here's what we know:

errorNextVote.message: The next voting attempt will be made in $minutes$ minutes

timeStamp.message: the time stamp is set to

errorblock.message: Failed to contact the server worldclockapi.com, $error$ If you have incorrectly set the time on your computer, the extension will not work correctly

errorClock2.message: Failed to contact the server worldclockapi.com, HTTP status Code: $httpCode$. If you have incorrectly set the time on your computer, the extension will not work correctly

clockInaccurate.message: It seems your watch $inaccurate$ at $count$ $unit$. The extension will not work correctly, please set the time correctly

secondBonus.message: On $project$ you still need to collect the reward for voting, let's automate this too?

redirectedSecondBonus.message: There was a redirect to $url$, it looks like you are not logged in to this site, or there is another problem. Check this URL

unecryptedTokenVK.message: Disclaimer: VK cookies will be stored Unencrypted and can be hacked. You use VK cookies at your own risk!

countVote.message: How many votes make per day

userAgent.message: If you are using a mobile device, you need additional permission to vote on ServerPact or MinecraftIpList, please provide it. If you are using a computer you may not grant this permission
